name: untraditional
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not following accepted traditions: The styles are decidedly untraditional, which is why young people like them. This piece mixes the symphony orchestra with untraditional instruments, such as the marimba and the flamenco guitar. Opposite
traditional
More examplesFewer examplesThey have some rather untraditional ideas of marriage.The dancers were jumping with their knees together in very untraditional ballet poses.The show's director wanted to approach the opening of the musical in an untraditional way.She comes from a very untraditional family.
